attributes.action: End diplomatic relations with israel until they comply with UN law and make the friends of israel a terroist organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The abuse of the people of palestine is against all international law and is only making the middle east more unstable and leading to more wars that we cannot sustain we must stop funding zionist agression

rejection.details: There are already a number of similar petitions on the site.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
